Tutorial.AutoTvm.Env_register
=====================

Neural Network Code Generation environment uses a :class:`TvmEnv
<third_party.compiler_gym.envs.optimization.TvmEnv>` to register a base environment. Policy search module uses A
:class:`BanditTvmEnv <third_party.compiler_gym.envs.optimization.BanditTvmEnv>` to register a base environment.

.. contents:: Neural Network Code Generation Environment Classes:
  :local:

.. currentmodule:: compiler_gym.envs.optimization

TvmEnv
-------
.. autoclass:: TvmEnv
  :members:

BanditTvmEnv
-------
.. autoclass:: BanditTvmEnv
  :members:
